title: Annaki
content:
Annaki is a gear brand in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3. In Splatoon 2, Annaki gear has a 5× chance to roll Main Power Up (formerly Cold-Blooded before its removal in the version 4.3.0 update) as a secondary ability, and a 0.5× chance of rolling Special Saver. In Splatoon 3, Annaki gear has a 5× chance to roll Ink Saver (Sub) as a secondary ability, and a 0.5× chance of rolling Special Saver.

Annaki gear is inspired by the post-punk culture and fashion commonly associated with anarchist movements.

The Annaki logo appears to be a stylized squid or Jellyfish inside a circle, forming a loose "A". A capital "A" enclosed in a circle is also a traditional symbol of anarchism.

For the category page, see Category:Annaki.

- Annaki Splattershot Nova (collaboration with "Splat")

Reaching a cumulative amount of stars on Annaki gear will reward the player with badges.

- Promotional image for Splatoon 3

Annaki sounds similar to "anarchy" (especially in non-rhotic dialects), which references the fact that it is inspired by anarchist movements.
